summary: This is a brief email exchange from June 24, 2019, where a U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) team member requests a copy of the 'DPA' (likely meaning the Non-Prosecution Agreement or NPA) related to the Epstein investigation. The sender 'a' replies 'Definitely â€” attached' and attaches a PDF file named 'Epstein_NPA,_dated_2007-09-24.pdf'.

events.title: Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) dated
events.description: The attached PDF is the Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement, dated September 24, 2007.

events.title: Request for Epstein NPA by USANYS team
events.description: A team member from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York emails a request for the 'DPA' (likely the NPA), and receives it attached in reply.

keyFacts: The email exchange occurs on June 24, 2019, involving a request from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) for the Epstein 'DPA'.
The sender 'a' attaches a PDF file specifically named 'Epstein_NPA,_dated_2007-09-24.pdf', confirming the existence and specific date of the Non-Prosecution Agreement.
This document shows ongoing interest and internal review of the 2007 Epstein NPA by federal prosecutors in 2019, likely in connection with renewed investigations.
